Brother Wales' case has been a trouble to me, but I have a more distinct light on it, and I will now say that if Brother Wales keeps close to the Lord Jesus, he will be safe; for Christ has pledged his infinite power, 


                                    -342- 

faithfulness, and love to save to the uttermost. Let Brother Wales know that I have written this.--Letter 41, 1902, pp. 2, 3. (To Brother and Sister Palmer, March 18, 1902.) 

Released June 29, 1976.
